title: Weed wiper 2.4m
summary: Tool for selective application of herbicide with a minimum 2.4m working width.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: be a weed wiper with a minimum 2.4m working width
eligible.eligibleBullet04: have a minimum of one rotating application roller made of carpet, brush or absorbent pad
eligible.eligibleBullet05: have an electric pump and pump control to regulate herbicide application
